title: Frequency of internet use in Spain 2017
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories for the x axis representing Duration, and a y axis representing Share of individuals.
The highest category is found at Once_a_week_(including_every_day) where Share of individuals is 80.0.
The lowest category is found at Less_than_once_a_week where Share of individuals is 5.0.

data.Duration: At least once a week (but not every day)
